participant_2.background:
I should have been a farmer, growing my own beef.
I'm a florist from the Pacific Northwest.
I will be entertained while I wait for my DM to arrive.
i am a father.
i do not like being asked a lot of questions.

content.text: Hello, I'm good thanks. How are you?
I'm doing well, thank you. What do you do for a living?
I'm a florist from the Pacific Northwest.
That's so interesting, I've always wanted to be a florist. I love working with flowers. What's your favorite flower?
My favorite flower is the sunflower. I love their bright colors and cheerful disposition.
Sunflowers are beautiful! I love them too. What's your favorite thing about being a florist?
I love getting to create beautiful arrangements and seeing the joy on people's faces when they see them.
That's such a great feeling! I'm sure your arrangements are amazing.
Thank you! I'm glad you think so.
I'm sure you're a great florist. What's your favorite thing about the Pacific Northwest?
I love the natural beauty of the area. The mountains, the ocean, the forests. It's so peaceful and relaxing.
It sounds like a beautiful place to live.
It is. I'm so lucky to live here.
